com.sun.enterprise.component
Class ComponentManager

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.enterprise.component.ComponentManager

public class ComponentManager
extends java.lang.Object

ComponentManager is responsible for instantiating components, as well as injecting and extracting resources from components. Components are defined with an interface they implement. Usually a component will implement the Service interface so the corresponding META-INF/services entries are created automatically. The component manager is a thread safe, it keeps no context between invocations.

Author:
Jerome Dochez

Constructor Detail

ComponentManager

public ComponentManager(ResourceManager resourceMgr)
Creates a new component manager capable of instantiating components, injecting and extracting resources from these components. Resources are procured and stored in the resource manager instance passed as a parameter. The resourceManager instance cannot be null.

Parameters:
resourceMgr - Resource manager used to get/store resources from/to
Method Detail

getResourceManager

public ResourceManager getResourceManager()
Returns the resource manager associated with this instance

Returns:
the resource manager

instantiate

public <T> T instantiate(java.lang.Class<T> contract,
                         java.util.logging.Logger logger)
              throws ComponentException
Instantiate a new service implementing the passed contrat

Parameters:
contract - is the contract the component must implement
logger - used for logging
Returns:
a new instance of a service implementing the contract interface
Throws:
ComponentException

inject

public void inject(java.lang.Object component,
                   java.util.logging.Logger logger)
            throws ComponentException
Injects all resources identified with Requires annotation, throw a CompomentException if a resource cannot be injected (like there is no instance of that contract available to inject).

Parameters:
component - component instance to inject
logger - used to log any information
Throws:
ComponentException

extract

public void extract(java.lang.Object component,
                    java.util.logging.Logger logger)
             throws ComponentException
Extracts resources identified with Provides annotation and store them using the resource manager instance

Parameters:
component - the component we should extract resources from
logger - used to log information about the extraction
Throws:
ComponentException - if the resource extract fail
